welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lomianki, a charming city in Poland known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mazury Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal with state-of-the-art facilities, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Modlin Airport, handling all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
